abstract: Bank of America raised $13.47 billion through a share sale, marking a major step toward meeting the government’s capital requirements under the stress tests.
snippet: Bank of America raised $13.47 billion through a share sale, marking a major step toward meeting the government’s capital requirements under the stress tests.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America raised nearly $13.5 billion through a share sale, marking a major step toward meeting the United States government’s requirements for capital-raising after the recent stress test of the bank.

headline.main: Bank of America Raises $13.5 Billion in Share Sale

abstract: Early optimism over a $13.5 billion stock offering by Bank of America faded in the afternoon, leading some investors to cash in their gains.
snippet: Early optimism over a $13.5 billion stock offering by Bank of America faded in the afternoon, leading some investors to cash in their gains.
lead_paragraph: Markets fell slightly on Wednesday as early optimism over a $13.5 billion stock offering by Bank of America faded in the afternoon, leading some investors to cash in their gains before the holiday weekend.

headline.main: Wall Street Stumbles as Day Nears End
headline.print_headline: Wall Street Stumbles as Day Nears End
